Go Back Review Name: Nice product Review Description: No doubt in LG brands product they deliver what they promised,A/C Working great and in less than 10 minute room getting cooled, Only issue i faced was with LG Installation they are handling it to third part vendor not direct LG executive , they where so rude and unprofessional I didn't expect such kind of installation from LG other than that everything is good 4 Star for LG Product 1 Star less for LG Installation
